title: Can't download League installer . EUNE
body: Anyone can please help me? I had an error when trying  to run client so i tried to reinstall it. I tried to download the client but it says that this page doesn't work. Any advice?

replies.body: Make sure that you're using the [direct download site](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload) to download the client.  You might have an extension or protection software blocking your download, and adjsut it to allow access.  You can also try Incognito or another browser to see if that works.  I hope that helps!
